definition: Qiongzhou, historic name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Qiongzhou Strait (between Hainan Island and mainland China)

sentences.english: Lingaojiao lighthouse, located in the Qiongzhou Strait West entrance.
sentences.chinese: 臨高角燈塔，位於瓊州海峽西面進口處。

sentences.english: This paper, taking Qiongzhou University as an example, analyses how to use the library.
sentences.chinese: 本文以瓊州學院爲例，論述如何利用圖書館。

sentences.english: It is in the southern end of china, facing the mainland to the north by Qiongzhou Channel.
sentences.chinese: 它位於中國的最南端，與大陸相隔瓊州海峽。

sentences.english: During his reign over Guangdong and Guangxi, Zhang Zhidong made some achievements on governing the Li nationality in Qiongzhou.
sentences.chinese: 張之洞督粵期間治理瓊州黎族取得了一定的成效。

sentences.english: It is bordered by Qiongzhou Strait in the north and is facing Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 海口北臨瓊州海峽，與雷州半島遙相對峙。

sentences.english: To implement ocw livelihood management regulations.
sentences.chinese: 本規則由瓊州海峽管理處監督執行。

definition: Shen Baozhen (1820-1879), Qing Minister of the Navy, founded Fuzhou Naval College 船政學堂|船政学堂[Chuan2 zheng4 Xue2 tang2] in 1866

Haifeng county in Shanwei 汕尾, Guangdong
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
Raoping county in Chaozhou 潮州[Chao2 zhou1], Guangdong
Guangning county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong

governor general 总督 and inspector general 巡抚
navy (in Qing times)
Anlu county level city in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
Lianzhou county level city in Qingyuan 清远, Guangdong
Huanggang prefecture-level city in Hubei
Jianli county in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei
